base_description: Modern office chair, black, ergonomic design.
part_description: Includes a cushioned seat, backrest, two armrests, and a five-wheel base. The seat and backrest are rectangular, armrests are flat and positioned on each side, and the base is star-shaped.
internal_interaction_description: The seat is connected to the backrest, providing support. Armrests are attached to the sides of the seat, offering comfort. The base supports the seat and allows movement through wheels, connected via a central stem that enables rotation and height adjustment.
external_interaction_description: The chair interacts with the floor through its wheels, allowing mobility. It supports a person sitting, providing comfort and posture support. The height adjustment lever interacts with the user to customize seating height. The chair can be moved and positioned under desks or tables easily.
